verses.name: Luke 3:17
verses.text: Whose fan is in his hand, and he will throughly purge his floor, and will gather the wheat into his garner; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable.

verses.name: Luke 3:18
verses.text: And many other things in his exhortation preached he unto the people.

verses.name: Luke 3:19
verses.text: But Herod the tetrarch, being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip’s wife, and for all the evils which Herod had done,

verses.name: Luke 3:20
verses.text: Added yet this above all, that he shut up John in prison.

verses.name: Luke 3:21
verses.text: Now when all the people were baptized, it came to pass, that Jesus also being baptized, and praying, the heaven was opened,
